input.sentences: [female] 's wedding . all her friends and relatives are gathered here .
i love [female] 's dress . black is much better than white for her .
we went out to a club to celebrate .
everybody getting drunk in this club tonight .
output.sentences: A man in a grey shirt and a woman in the pink dress looked on as the ceremony began.
The bride and groom looked out at their friends and family as the prepared to be married.
They read their vows to each other with nervous emotion.
Later that evening, they were able to cut loose and celebrate with drinks.
The woman in the pink dress looked on at the happy couple and wondered if she would ever have that same feeling of joy.
